description: The Verify Room Cleaning phase lets an operator verify that a dispensing room has been cleaned to the required state by comparing room cleanliness status against recipe-defined criteria.
intent: Ensure the dispense room meets the required cleanliness status before proceeding
example_usage: Operator views instructions, selects the appropriate cleanliness status (General Clean, Complete Clean, or Needs Cleaning), provides the required confirmation signature, and clicks Finish to complete the phase.
